website_summaries.verdict: A sweet little wide-angle compact, the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W350 should make a lot of snapshooters happy.
cons: Generally soft and somewhat noisy photos at full size

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued model but still a very good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact size, the Sony brand, and overall quality. There's a dedicated movie button. It takes video but it's only 720p. That's not full HD, but can be OK for YouTube, etc. I found the camera to be easy to use. And lasts pretty long on a charge. The optical zoom is only 4X. But I only use it as my backup camera. I bought this one used, and for the price it was a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: David Batterson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Photos!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is much better than expected! It takes very clear photos including excellent photos on the dark. It’s very durable. I used it for over a year during a deployment to Iraq and it is still on great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tameckio

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC350
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small footprint digital camera for work with a good wide angle lens. I have been using an older DSC P50 for years with an attachable wide angle lens. I need an wide angle lens since I tend to take pictures of large items, offshore structures, from a short distance. It appeared this camera fit the bill and it turns out it has a wider angle view than my P50 with the wide angle attachment. Very pleased with the operation and can also use the panorama feature for those areas where I still can't get everything in one shot. Small size, good features, just what I was looking for. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Serious bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera. I bought it as my "go everywhere" camera. The sweep panorama is great, but good lighting is a must when using this feature. It's moderately quick and the intelligent auto is great for taking the fuss out of shooting great images. The one thing I would change is the battery lock latch. Just seems flimsy. The picture quality is great for non-pros such as myself, and the size/weight is just amazing. I did notice some noise on indoor, low light photos, but for the price, this can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Crooklyn

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera two years and would definitely not get this one again. It takes acceptable photos, nothing like I would expect for the difference from my last camera to this one. The video is ok, but I kept having issues with it going in and out of focus, with other cameras with a much lower mp I never had that problem. I did look at reviews and the manual to see if there was some setting to change, but anything I found was not in the options on my camera, and Sony was little help.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As a Mac user I won't purchase another Sony camera
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Sony products before & have always been satisfied with how well they work & how long they last. However I do have one problem with the company. For some reason, they continue to update the computer software for PC's, but not for Macintoshes. I bought this camera as a present for someone who wanted it, but I won't buy another Sony for myself, because of the reason stated above.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Roughly 3 years later
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very compact. It fits in a pocket without any hassel panoramic mode decent zoom Cons: noisy photos if lighting is not optimum Summary: I use it on trips which I take about 5-6 per year. It takes better pictures than our Galaxy s3 or Galaxy Note 2 but not by a whole lot. I like that it takes very good pictures and if it were to die on me (water, dropped, stolen) I'm not out a hole bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremie Todd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Point and Shoot Camera!
customer_reviews.text: After unwrapping the package and discovering a Dora the Explorer Box???:) I found what seems to be an unused in GREAT condition, everything included: camera, cables, CD-Rom, manuals and battery (which was charged) and the proper settings on the camera were up to date. THANK YOU!!! This was the best DEAL ever!!!! (about 50 bucks for a USED camera??...I love it!) The camera is fantastic I love all the features it offers... Merry Christmas to ME!!!!
customer_reviews.author: chikiBABY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a high end quality digital camera for my 84 year Dad and after quite a bit of research found Sony to be the right fit for him. I got the best price on Amazon. The camera is great for everyday use taking photos, videos, etc. The picture quality as well as the video beats my Nikon. My Dad is very happy with the camera. I have it the 4 star just because of the software download which is not as user friendly as my Nikon. The order arrived as promised along with all the cables.
customer_reviews.author: nikkius

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: Works great above and bellow water (With Case). The pictures are of suprisingly good quality. I've taken this to glaciers, scuba diving 80 feet bellow and more and I'm am extremely happy with this camera. No complaints over all.... - The screen will let you think the pictures are over exposed (especially with flash at night) but when you transfer to the PC they come out great.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for my aunt (her camera was stolen). She loved it! Specially because it's pink. It has all the good features of a Sony - easy to use, great image quality. The big display is also a plus. One thing that I really didn't like is the N-type battery - it is smaller, but it also means it doesn't last as long as a G-type. With the big LCD, this means you MUST have a spare battery or you'll run out of juice in the middle of your day. At least if you are on vacation, using this camera constantly. It's a great camera, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Eugenio Santos

customer_reviews.title: This cam is great, small and takes very good photos
customer_reviews.text: This cam is great, small and takes very good photos, I have it for many years and is still as new, I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Bulmes

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for $200
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Small, fast turn on time, quick button for picture/video preview, able to use SD cards, rechargable battery last pretty long. Con: 720 HD not supported for other video programs-only Sony, video out connector on camera not standard USB type, cannot shoot with flash always on (off or auto only), smile detection doen't always work.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my hubby, and he absolutely loves it! It's easy to use, we didn't even need to look at the manual. I ordered this on a Friday, and received it on a Tuesday- shipping was fast!! =] I love how it has a smile detector, which is great, especially for taking pics of younger kids. All in all, this is a great point and shoot camera, and I would recommend buying this one. I gave 3 stars for the video function, only because we haven't tested it out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Larlie

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera after a good experience with an earlier model. The automatic settings are a lot better, which results in better photos: I like this camera's picture quality a lot more than others (I've tried Kodak and Canon point and shoots). The video lets you zoom in and out (something the earlier model didn't have) and the panorama function works like a breeze. I haven't had time to grasp all of the features, but a couple of weeks with the camera has made very happy with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Returned camera.
customer_reviews.text: Camera was without a battery or memory card. Rather useless so I returned it. They were good about it though.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: cheap camera for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: we use these at work in the warehouse to take pictures and it does the trick
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Cool Camera
customer_reviews.text: After looking at various options, I zeroed on this camera. It is a very small in size, easily fits into a pocket or a compact purse. The pictures are sharp and clear. The bonus on this camera which a lot of others do not have is the panoramic shot. It takes only a couple of tries to get it right and it becomes a breeze. I got some awesome panoramic shots of the Niagara Falls, getting the falls in a continuous shot. Would recommend it highly for the small size, crisp pictures and the panoramic shots.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dinakar

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my mom for Christmas because her button was broken, and the button on this was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Johnna Shearer

customer_reviews.title: WORST SONY IN 30 YEARS. - STUPID DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: WORST MOST CLUMSY SONY I EVER OWNED - JUST STUPID - Charger and HUGE CORD are bigger than the camera. Battery charges INSIDE THE CAMERA = STUPID, TIME WASTING, CLUMSY, won't fit in case they sent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how awesome this camera is. The specs and descriptions do it no justice. Turned out way better than I thought. There is a long load between photos, like 3 seconds, but it's great. I bought this as a present for a friend, and she absolutely loves it. Her pictures have turned out great. Pictures are very clear, of course. The menu is easy to use. The buttons are not complicated so anyone can use them. The automatic features are quite intuitive. Even pictures in bad light come out great. The viewer screen is a great size and makes previewing your pictures great. Great size. Easy to hold. I do recommend a case to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Harley W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it Same camera I had but I damaged my old one. So happy I found another. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.text: Same camera I had but I damaged my old one. So happy I found another. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: melinda abplanalp

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.  I've used it for years.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for years. It has taken amazing pictures and held up very well. I don't use it much anymore because of my other cameras and cell phone, but I still am amazed at the quality of many of the pictures I've taken with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: R. Montagne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this camera for about a year and I absolutely loved it! Never had any problems with it and all my pictures came out looking amazing! I would still have the camera to this day but unfortunately someone stole it at a birthday party. Now I have the Sony NEX-C3 and that's even better!!! All my pictures look like a professional photographer took them, so I guess I'm pretty happy someone stole my Cybershot or else I wouldn't have gotten the camera I have now :p but the Cybershot is a great camera too!
customer_reviews.author: pdawg256

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel and Everyday
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good camera, it is small but the quality and features are not at all lacking. Pictures are very crisp and video footage is clear. The camera itself is slim and fits well in a pocket or your bag. Sometimes a DSLR is just too bulky, and this is a good alternative to have on hand for those quick moments or if your traveling it takes up less space when packing and again you will still get stunning photos. This camera would be good for anyone, it is very user friendly and advanced enough for those that want a little more from their camera.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Nice pictures, but flash can be TOO bright.
customer_reviews.text: For a digital camera, this takes really nice pictures. I find the interface and controls for Sony cameras to be very intuitive and simple, and this follows right along with that. My one beef with this camera is the brightness of the flash. It can be SO BRIGHT that it starts to wash out highlights in the photos you take. On some Sony cameras this can be turned down in the settings, but on this it cannot.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Buttgen

customer_reviews.title: works as described
customer_reviews.text: picture taking is of very good quality.shutter speed and automatic focus is pretty darn fast...everything works and does as it say's in the description.The only thing that's not so good is the quality in the panorama..the quality is not as clear as the regular pictures..but over all..I am satisfied with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd

customer_reviews.title: An underrated video camera in an ultra-compact body
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Sony W350 about two weeks ago. I have taken it on an outdoor daytime canoe trip and to an indoor concert. I decided to buy this after my Canon 770sd wasn't current enough with higher video technology and I just wanted a new camera. This was an extremely good buy for the price of $159.99. For all the features the Sony has I would highly recommend it. Now for my detailed review.
customer_reviews.author: nsoat

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Camera
customer_reviews.text: PROS: The pictures quality are very neat , but can be determinated by the luminity, the brighter the better, but if objects don't move with few light you get better results , true colors, very portable, HD video is amaizing, SD compatibility, MP4 video format is a standard many coders use it. CONS: Some times take a while to focus while you are recording, an extra backup battery is desireble.
customer_reviews.author: Taurino

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY PHOTOGRAPHER
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these cameras now. This one I purchased as a backup for my underwater photos and videos. I take one of these cameras everywhere. They fit in your pocket or purse and take great pictures. I wish they had a little bit further zoom; but otherwise, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera, love the image stabilization which sets sony apart from other cameras, burst mode can take fast pics the picture quality is amazing and the picture quality does not decrease with zoom like some other cameras, Loving every minute of using it!!!! only wish it had a further zoom, otehrwise a 5 star product
customer_reviews.author: zaz

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time- get a canon
customer_reviews.text: Total crap. I had nothing but problems with this when I got it, and it never took good pictures. I bought it just for the color and totally regretted it. I went back to Canon soon after, with no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: MCShopper

customer_reviews.title: slow but good
customer_reviews.text: my sony dsc-350. takes great pictures, but is slow to activate shutter. a moving object will out of the picture by the time shutter opens and takes the pic.but you learn to work with it. this is my second 350. had a 330, but it tried to swim the river and didn't work afterword. 180 degree picture is the feature that keeps me coming back. newer models seem to made more cheaply . but older models can still be found.great little cam. very pocket sized.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Welton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice compact camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera because its small and fast, gives very good pictures and good video. I had previous models of the same bramd but this is even better than I ever thought. Easy to use. Compact, lightweigh, good batery life. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: RZC

customer_reviews.title: SONY CYBERSHOT W350
customer_reviews.text: Just love this camera, it makes me glad my other one broke. It arrived on the 1st day of the estimated shipping dates. My only disappointment, which was not the sellers fault was that I had to wait for the battery to charge before I could use it. My favorite is the Sweep Panorama, it is so easy and fun and with the software when you view them it's like a short video clip. I've had alot of fun with this camera so far with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: D.C. PARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 6 years ago and still working. Buy it. It just works.
customer_reviews.author: L. Yaranon

customer_reviews.title: Okay and simple but feels cheap and panorama view is limited.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is okay, seems to do the job but it feels like a cheap camera, poorly made. The other complaint is that the panorama mode greatly cuts off part of the image. It's not like you're taking a bunch of standard pictures and stitching them together automatically. Instead it's like just the center of the shots are stitched together so panorama mode is a little misleading. I wouldn't run to get this camera unless you're not very picky then its fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes pretty good pics but with advent of better phone cameras , it is not gonna be too popular
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: The BIG midget
customer_reviews.text: This camera has everything, including taking panoramic pictures that are completed in the camera (no stitching in the computer is necessary). The pictures are above average in quality and clarity, good enough to use for publishing in a newsletter or a commercial newspaper. Taking panoramic pictures is very easy. It is small enough to go anywhere you go and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Scheuerman

customer_reviews.title: Sony camera review
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I have not played with the features much, but I took it on a trip shortly after I bought it and it worked great. It is easy to use and the battery lasts a long time. It's size makes it easy to carry. I would highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: tennis mom

customer_reviews.title: Still love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the camera for three years now. No problems ever and the picture quality is so good. If you need good pictures, drop the iPhone and get a real camera. The quality is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: ShredderX

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This is very good point-and-shoot camera which takes very good pictures. The camera is really simple to use (my daughter loves to take photographs with this). The video quality is really good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Great Pocket Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! We use the panoramic shot all the time and love the option! One complaint my daughter has is you cannot shoot in black & white or sepia but this is so easy to change later it doesn't matter much. shutter speed is nice, it take a second for the display to pop up but it's only the display, the actual picture snaps fast!
customer_reviews.author: Heather D

customer_reviews.title: Condition was surprise
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that I was able to replace my camera for so little but the condition wasn't what I expected. The front plate shows signs of being pried open (small chip and bent from top to bottom). The lens covers? don't open or close all the way and need a little nudge each time. Would I buy it again? yes, still a great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: art newbie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera after having multiple Nikon Coolpix. I really love this camera's quality as compared to the Nikon. The photos always come out crisp and are never fuzzy. I like the panoramic option also.
customer_reviews.author: NurseJen

customer_reviews.title: You get what you expect
customer_reviews.text: It's obviously not a DSLR but it takes pretty decent pictures. It's small so that's good. It's pretty slow when taking pictures from pressing the button to actually taking the picture so that kind of sucks, but if things aren't moving at all it's good. Just know what you're paying for and it'll meet expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kung

customer_reviews.title: OK. Not the best
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality constructed compaact camera with a lot of features at a fair price, but the image quality isn't that great. It never has taken a really sharp picture. Some images are better than others, but I believe the optics are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Todd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for vacas and such for a few years . Now my I6 phone is more convenient
customer_reviews.author: SRT Challenger 392

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent camera. Bought it for my daughter as a point and shoot. I just dont like the long flashes and the double flashing. Also it doesnt use the standard memory card. However it takes good pics and if your not bothered by the dual flashes the camera is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Got the camera for my wife for Christmas. She doesn't like to mess with the settings, so I needed something that she can just point and shoot. The camera works great. The few times we have used it, the pictures have been bright and clear. Definitely a good product for the price. No complaints so far and of course Amazon shipped it on the day they said they would, even a few days before Christmas. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I lasted a year. began to fail several functions ...
customer_reviews.text: I lasted a year. began to fail several functions. The lens in and out. The switch of camera, video and panoramic failed.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Yanez

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. It has been fairly simple to use, and it is nice and small for when I want to throw it in my purse at an event.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.D.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Wish the zoom was better but its still a very good compact camera and easy to keep in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Jagga

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures and has many great features. The only problem I have is that the zoom is not slow and steady. It jumps, so you can't gradually zoom in on something when taking a video.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing point-and-shoot camera.
customer_reviews.text: For me, i like a lot of color and depth in my pictures so I can use them as my desktop background here and there. This is one of the fastest snapshot cameras I have used and is perfect for taking pics of moving objects. All in all I'm extremely happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: colorizzle

customer_reviews.title: sont dsc-w350 camera
customer_reviews.text: This has been a very good camera for the price. It has so many different setting you can do almost anything with it. Iwould recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mcluckie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, great product. Nice to have it when you don't want to carry extra bag for the item itself, can fit easily in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Poor battery life. Great image and above average for its time user interface.
customer_reviews.author: ProPilot

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-W350 14.1MP Digital Camera Review
customer_reviews.text: As most of the digital cameras from sony, the Sony DSC-W350 14.1MP Digital Camera is also a good product with some interesting features. 1. Size of the camera. Its almost like a phone that you can put in your pocket. 2. Sweep panorama mode where you can capture a wide area. 3. Zoom while taking a video.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-W350 14.1MP
customer_reviews.text: Very light and easy to use. Great Pictures! It uses squares to focus on faces. No blurrs. I love it. Haven't had a chance to use the panorama or video features yet. But so far I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S. Sydnor

customer_reviews.title: hi
customer_reviews.text: Powerful wonderful easy pushes you for creativity Powerful wonderful easy pushes you for creativity Powerful wonderful easy pushes you for creativity
customer_reviews.author: mohameed

customer_reviews.title: Better than my DSC 200
customer_reviews.text: This is better then the DSC W200 i currently own which I bought at about the same price. Pictures are better. No blur. Faster recovery after every shot. The panoramic option is a premium.
customer_reviews.author: James Makasiar

customer_reviews.title: keeps on ticking
customer_reviews.text: Bought this some time ago, like a Timex, or energizer bunny, just keeps on ticking.
customer_reviews.author: Mhkmark

customer_reviews.title: Enhanced Colors, compact, HD video, but difficult navigation
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera for beginners. I own multiple cameras including SLRs, and this one is a very good camera for taking colorful pictures. The images are more saturated and warmer which makes it a great camera for taking images of kids or color filled environment. This is the bad part about the camera too, as it does not preserve natural colors. Pros: 1. Compact 2. Very affordable 3. Good Video resolution Cons 1. Difficult to navigate to settings 2. Feels less durable 3. Picture quality is bad(like images taken from Mobile Phone) Pro & con: Images are more color-saturated and warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak R

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I have a dslr, and I still love this camera. Great quality, easy to carry on trips/outings, and easy to adjust settings.
customer_reviews.author: Kmac

customer_reviews.title: Sony camera
customer_reviews.text: This a really good digital camrta! I always look for Sony products when purchading digital equipment. The item arrived as scheduled. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: tantelo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: excellente product was what I expected, I loved it, hope to buy thank you very much, all very well, immediate response
customer_reviews.author: Domingo Ordaz

customer_reviews.title: Camera Review
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-T33 for a number of years until it finally gave out on me. Since I had been pleased with the results of that camera, I went searching for another Sony and realized how out-of-date my existing camera was. I ended up with this model due to other customer positive reviews. Plain and simple, this camera has exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: mols

customer_reviews.title: I RECOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.text: Excelete PRODUCT AND THAT USED TO BUY IT. I RECOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.author: LUIS EDUARDO PACHECO CARMONA

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in the condition it was said to be in. Photos did not seem to mimic the actual item up close however. However, photos get taken well, but videos don't seem to be as good of quality as the photos. Quality matches the price. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Airee

customer_reviews.title: Great Point and Shoot Camera
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a Sony camera that was small but took great photos. This is a great, easy to use camera! It is probaly the best camera in it's price range. It also takes great HD movie clips. If you want a small point and shoot camera for under $200 get this one.
customer_reviews.author: SailorSquirrel

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Got the camera a day before I traveled to Asia and Africa. Very easy to use, and the photos were great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Readinggal

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, with a decent lens
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, with a decent lens. It's small size and large viewscreen are a plus. I have owned several, however, and with heavy usage, the arrow button usually tends to break. Still, this is a good camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Liefer

customer_reviews.title: Nice slim package
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice slim cybershot! Good optical zoom and some innovative features such as SMILE SHUTTER, SWEEP PANORAMA!. The picture quality was decent. The size of the camera is so small that you would almost forget after you slip it into your pocket! However this small size and light weight also may make is uncomfortable for some to use. The optical image stabilization is good. The camera has almost no manual control and to change any settings one has to take a deeper dive into the menu system. Great for those who do not go beyond the automatic mode. Has a dedicated button for switching between video, shapshot and sweep panorama mode.
customer_reviews.author: Anoop Vishwakarma

customer_reviews.title: nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This camera is pretty good. The only gripe I have is with night shots. I expect a little lag with a point and shoot, but there is just too much noise for my liking. All other features are alright although the video may fall a little short to some expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this dainty little camera! The color is cute, and it functions outstandingly! Crisp clear photos, no blurs even when I purposefully moved. love the panoramic feature! Can't wait to use it when I go to Hawaii later this year! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: J.M.W.J.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is short
customer_reviews.text: This camera can take clear pictures, but battery life is short. I guess size is compromising performance.
customer_reviews.author: L. Roche

customer_reviews.title: Loved this camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was such a great deal for the price. The picture quality is sharp and it's so easy to use. Switching from picture to video is just a slide of a button. The video quality is HD. No fuzzy videos where you can barely make out someone's face. Plus this thing is compact and lightweight so it's easy to tote in my purse or my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good camera. makes great pics. nice color, my gf loves it. good price/quality
customer_reviews.author: alfredo lebiere

customer_reviews.title: A serviceable point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of bells and whistles like 360 degree photos. Photo quality okay. Good for documenting house contents for insurance purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera, although is not entirely a point and shoot. You need to get use to it, and to all its features but once you've done it you can take great images and videos. I totally recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac LLG

customer_reviews.title: DSC-W350
customer_reviews.text: Gave this one to my wife and she likes it very much. straight forward settings and easy to use. Sharp results.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Epple

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera but only problem that i found is that when you are recording a video and you zoom something, the noise on the video y very loud. Also, i don't know how to take pictures in SEPIA mode and grey scale of colors. Thats it. I recommend it any way.
customer_reviews.author: mtordeaux

customer_reviews.title: Sony Camerea
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my dad, and he LOVES it! A great upgrade to his old dinosaur of a camera he had before, plus he was able to figure it out on his own. lol
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera as a birthday present for our college-age son. He did all the research so I don't know many of the technical specifications but I did see the pictures of a recent spring break trip he took to the Grand Canyon and Moab area of Utah. Wonderful pictures! I especially liked the panorama shots that this camera can take. Personally the only thing I don't like about this camera is the battery. I prefer cameras that use AA batteries and while AA batteries do make for a bit bulkier camera, in my opinion it is not a significant issue. Other than that this seems like a very fine camera.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Scheumann

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my previous Fujifilm camera this one is amazing. The panorama setting is complicated to figure out. But I just want to take snapshots so it doesnt bother me. I have only had it for a few days so we will see how it holds up. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan T. Gloe

customer_reviews.title: For the price I paid a great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great pictures - with limited zoom and okay to bad night pictures. I love the panoramic feature . Also, night picture probably could have been improved if perhaps I increase the resolution .
customer_reviews.author: diego

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, take pictures as easy as you want it to, need to read the manual if your not familiar with sony products before using it, but once you figure it out your idea of taking good pictures takes a pro will be fade away
customer_reviews.author: A. Levanti

customer_reviews.title: Great Price... Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is Amazing... I bought 2 of them, one for another person, and one for me, and It is just Great!! I recommend it to anyone...!!
customer_reviews.author: David Oseda

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for the older 7.1mp model. It is a lot smaller and lighter but the basic layout of the camera is still simple and easy to use. I have yet to try all the feature or attempt a print, but all indications are this is a great little basic point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. So small and light and takes beautiful pictures and great videos. I've taken it on a lot of trips and it has never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: JGam

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, relly good one,, need bye an memory, another litium battery and one case for save it all. The zoom is not the best but, tecnology - price is one of the best deals to do.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to replace a similar camera I ruined by getting it wet. Very satisfied with the price too!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick J. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The Zeiss lens really allows this camera to use it's 14.1 sensor to create wonderfully clear pictures. It's a nice camera with an excellent lens at an exceptional price point.
customer_reviews.author: K. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly happy with this purchase. I am not a professional photographer by any means but I just love to take pictures and this camera takes photos with excellent quality. That, coupled with quick delivery, made it a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: This camera is nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera recently and to my surprise its smaller than the before models but compliments any pocket. The shutter speed is slow between shots but the hand shaken technology is superb. For starters or camera novices this is a good camera especially in the auto mode
customer_reviews.author: Anderson C Eastnond

customer_reviews.title: sony camera
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my husband. Does not have a lot of interest in technology but is advancing with encouragement from family members. He opened this camera and every day he is excited that he has learned something new on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L. Kern

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-W350
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for quick snap shots. Small size and easy of make it easy to carry everywhere. This is my second camera I carry everywhere. If I need to take important pictures I fall back on my Nikon D80.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best camera so far
customer_reviews.text: This is something we bought for the house. It takes great photos and is easy to carry around. I really low how small it is, yet all the buttons are easy to use and it doesn't feel cramped. Great picture quality as well!
customer_reviews.author: SmartConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot 14mp review
customer_reviews.text: I love this camara!!! I wanted a high megapixal camara in pink and this is the one. It works super fast and takes great pictures. I am so glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Shackett

product_meta.title: Sony DSC-W350 14.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Zoom with Optical Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 2.7 inch LCD (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Color:SilverThe DSC-W350 captures images with amazing detail with its Carl Zeiss 26mm wide angle 4x zoom lens. Take breathtaking panoramas in Sweep panorama mode and review them on a 2.7” LCD. Record 720p high definition movies while Optical SteadyShot™ image stabilization, iAuto and Face Motion Detection makes taking great images in various conditions easy.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The DSC-W350 captures images with amazing detail with its Carl Zeiss 26mm wide angle 4x zoom lens. Take breathtaking panoramas in Sweep panorama mode and review them on a 2.7-inch LCD. Record 720p high definition movies while Optical SteadyShot image stabilization, iAuto and Face Motion Detection makes taking great images in various conditions easy. 

Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W350 Highlights 



14.1-megapixel Super HAD CCD Image Sensor
A powerful 14.1-megapixel, 1/2.3-inch Super HAD CCD image sensor helps you capture gorgeous images with superb contrast and clarity down to the finest detail. With 14.1 megapixels, you can create stunning, photo-quality prints up to A3+ (13x19-inch) size, or crop your images and still come away with high resolution shots. 

Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens with 4x optical zoom
The professional-quality Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 4x optical zoom lens brings distant subjects closer for great outdoor, sports, and travel photos. 

2.7-inch Clear Photo LCD display (230k pixels)
Generous 2.7-inch (230K pixels) Clear Photo LCD display features sharp, natural color that makes it easy to compose shots, read menus, and view photos, even in bright sunlight. 

Sweep Panorama mode
Reach beyond the traditional wide angle lens, and capture more breathtaking shots with Sweep Panorama Mode. Simply press the shutter button and sweep the camera in the desired direction and the camera continuously shoots at a high speed, then seamlessly stitches the images together with automatic position adjustment to create one stunning panoramic image. Available in wide and ultra-wide options, the camera can take panoramic shots of up to 185 degrees. Now capturing wide landscapes is as easy as press and sweep. 



HD MP4 Movie Mode
MP4 is a popular format for high definition video that compresses the size of your audio and video, making your media files small enough to easily transfer to your compatible PC or Mac. MP4 is also highly compatible with the Web, so you can effortlessly upload your media to popular photo or video-sharing Web sites like Photobucket or YouTube. (Compatible PC with internet capability required). 

Self-Portrait Timer
Self-Portrait Timer helps take the guesswork out of self portraits by utilizing Face Detection technology to recognize when your face enters the frame. Once the camera detects your face, it triggers a 2-second timer, and then snaps a picture. 

BIONZ Image Processor
The BIONZ image processor delivers the high resolution and fast performance you expect from a Sony digital camera. Fast processing enables unique Sony features such as Sweep Panorama, Handheld Twilight, Antimotion Blur, HDR, etc to take and combine multiple images in less than a second to create wide panoramic images. Images have reduced grain and appear less washed out. 



Intelligent Auto Mode
Unlike traditional auto mode, Intelligent Auto (iAuto) mode thinks for you, recognizing scenes, lighting conditions, faces, and adjusts settings resulting clear images, faces with natural skin tone and less blur. Take advantage of all the technology without leaving Auto mode. Take a picture from a kid on the playground, to landscape shots, to a beautiful flower or an indoor birthday party. All clear images without leaving auto mode. 

Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode
Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode automatically detects nine different types of scenes and, within just 1/30th of a second, selects the appropriate camera settings: Backlight, Backlight Portrait, Twilight, Twilight Portrait, Portrait, Landscape and. iSCN has two modes: Auto and Advanced. In Auto Mode, the camera takes a single shot using the optimal settings. In Advanced Mode, the camera takes a photo with the optimal settings and, if in difficult lighting (low light or back light) immediately takes a second photo with another optimized setting so you can choose which to keep. 

Optical SteadyShot image stabilization
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization uses a built-in gyro sensor to detect camera shake and automatically shifts the lens to help prevent blur without sacrificing image quality. 

Face Detection helps focus on the correct subject Face Detection technology
Face Detection technology detects up to eight individual faces and adjusts focus, exposure, and white balance to help deliver crisp, properly lit images of family and friends. 

Motion Detection
Motion Detection, along with Face Motion Detection adjusts ISO sensitivity and increases the shutter speed when movement is detected, reducing blur in moving subjects and faces. 

Anti-blink Function
It's frustrating to think you've captured that perfect shot, only to review it later and discover one of your subjects blinked just as you pressed the shutter. The Anti-blink function works to help counter blinking and squinting. When the camera is set to Soft Snap, the Anti-blink function captures two images, recording only the photo with less squinting. If a blink is detected in other shooting modes, a warning will be displayed after you take the shot. 

Smile Shutter technology Smile Shutter technology
Smile Shutter technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter button and the camera does the rest. You can also select adult and child priority and indicate the degree of Smile Detection Sensitivity. Intelligent Scene Recognition can now be used together with Smile Shutter mode when the Intelligent Auto mode is on. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting. 

Dynamic Range Optimizer Standard and Plus
Dynamic Range Optimizer (DRO) Standard and Plus uses a sophisticated algorithm to help recover shadows and highlights. The result is more natural images with clearer details that more closely match what your naked eye sees. DRO is particularly effective when shooting backlit portraits or any scene with a dramatic contrast between background and foreground lighting. DRO Plus allows for even greater optimization by analyzing each region of an image and performing additional image processing. 

Intelligent AF
Thanks to Intelligent AF technology, capture fleeting moments like a child's adorable expression with the ultra-quick AF which locks focus in as little as 0.3 seconds. 

Easy Shooting Mode
With Easy Shooting Mode, even beginners can take great photos. In Easy Shooting Mode, easy-to-understand basic instructions are displayed on the LCD screen and the camera switches to all automatic settings, removing several function choices and allowing you to focus on just your subject. Since this mode works together with Intelligent Scene Recognition, the camera selects the optimum setting for each scene. In addition the easy mode simplifies preview mode. 

Function Guide
This beginner-friendly optional function helps navigate through the various functions and settings displaying the description of chosen functions or settings on the LCD screen. 

In-Camera Retouching Tools
Retouch and enhance your photos on the go with in-camera Trimming, Red-Eye Correction, and Unsharp Masking functions 

In-camera retouching options 

PHOTOMUSIC
PHOTOMUSIC combines images with music (4 tracks, 5 minutes per track) to produce fun and entertaining slide shows with standard visual effects (Simple, Nostalgic, Active, and Stylish). Select from pre-loaded tracks on the camera or transfer your own from your compatible computer (sold separately). 

Viewing modes
Find your photos using the simple folder or calendar viewing modes. 

PhotoTV HD
Bring your photos to life and enjoy highly detailed, high definition images with PhotoTV HD-capable Sony BRAVIA HDTVs. PhotoTV HD fine tunes settings on your PhotoTV HD enabled BRAVIA HDTV, such as sharpness, gradation, and color to display images that look more like printed 

Media Card Slot
For convenient storage and sharing of your images, the DSC-W350 accepts Memory Stick Duo/Memory Stick PRO Duo/Memory Stick PRO-HG Duo (sold separately). 

SD Card Functionality
Sony SD memory cards are the perfect solution for storing and sharing your digital content such as high-quality photos, videos, music, and more. 

Lithium-ion battery
Included lithium-ion battery provides added convenience with longer lasting power than alkaline batteries. 

Includes Sony PMB (Picture Motion Browser) Software ver. 5.02
Sony Picture Motion Browser software offers a simple, intuitive way to transfer, sort, and view your video and still images on your compatible PC. In addition, multiple output options let you burn your memories to DVD (sold separately), as well as take advantage of one click upload to a number of popular video and photo sharing sites. 

Includes Sony PMBP (Picture Motion Browser Portable) software
With the pre-installed Picture Motion Browser (PMB) Portable software the DSC-W350 makes it easy to pre-select videos and images in the camera and conveniently upload them from the camera to a compatible PC and popular Internet sharing sites without the need for any additional software or install.
feature_bullets: 26mm equivalent Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens with 4x optical zoom
Capture breathtaking images in Sweep Panorama Mode
14.1-megapixel resolution; 2.7-inch LCD screen for easy viewing
Capture your videos in HD Movie mode (720p); Optical SteadyShot image stabilization reduces blur
Accepts Memory Stick Duo/Memory Stick PRO Duo/Memory Stick PRO-HG Duo (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars261 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
